name: Big Money!
description:
Big Money easy to play but hard to be master

The game takes place on a grid full of colored coins. There are five colors of coins: red, blue, yellow, green, and purple. Click on groups of three or more (in puzzle mode, two or more) same colored coins to make them disappear.

The game has Three main modes. In
1.Action Mode: the coins rise constantly, while in
2.Strategy Mode: the coins will only rise when the player clears a group.
3.Puzzle Mode: where the player must clear a certain coin arrangement.

Enjoy!

Issues or questions? Contact our support: contact@bringlifegames.com
